channel.title: Client error after gzipping raw files
channel.description:
This is what i'm getting in my run command prompt after logging into my server.
[code] Error: T2 - 126,134,126 - 5,0,0 - 57,57,10,122,-121, Error: T2 - 126,126,134 - 5,0,0 - 57,57,10,122,-120, Error: T2 - 126,126,126 - 16,0,0 - 69,120,112,58,32,49,52,51,57,49,49,54,48,10,1 22,-122, Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36 Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 158151 at Stream.method421(Stream.java:225) at Model.readOldModel(Model.java:847) at Model.<init>(Model.java:397) at Model.method462(Model.java:1025) at ItemDef.method201(ItemDef.java:763) at ItemDef.getSprite(ItemDef.java:648) at client.drawInterface(client.java:9836) at client.drawTabArea(client.java:2944) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:9625) at client.processDrawing(client.java:10465) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108) at client.run(client.java:6027) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code]
I gzipped my raw .dat files, reducing loading time, but it gets stuck at that when i try to log in, black screening me.

item.title: Client error after gzipping raw files
item.dc:creator: @Storm_Powner Storm Powner
item.description:
@Storm_Powner wrote:

you need to change some things in your client:

at Stream.method421(Stream.java:225) at Model.readOldModel(Model.java:847) at Model.<init>(Model.java:397) at Model.method462(Model.java:1025) at ItemDef.method201(ItemDef.java:763) at ItemDef.getSprite(ItemDef.java:648) at client.drawInterface(client.java:9836) at client.drawTabArea(client.java:2944) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:9625) at client.processDrawing(client.java:10465) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108) at client.run(client.java:6027) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

at tose methods in your client

Read full topic
item.source: Client error after gzipping raw files
